description: Luxure Global Citizen is a luxury global rewards program that connects 1200 luxury brands and 6.3 million clients in the world. As a means of payment, the service accepts the ‘exit coin’ utilising global luxury markets, including 12 sectors such as watches, jewellery and cars. The LGC application allows users to make online shopping in the luxury market, pay with LGC coins and get a 5% cash reward.
name: Luxure Global Citizen
